alert.note: Alert for Coastal Indian River; Coastal Martin; Coastal St. Lucie; Mainland Southern Brevard; Southern Brevard Barrier Islands (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued November 01 at 1:42AM EDT until November 03 at 4:00AM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 4 AM EDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Large breaking waves of 5 to 8 feet expected in the surf zone. * WHERE...Coastal Indian River, Coastal Saint Lucie, Coastal Martin, Mainland Southern Brevard and Southern Brevard Barrier Islands Counties. * WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to 4 AM EDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Dangerous swimming and surfing conditions and localized beach erosion. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Rip currents and strong southward flowing longshore current will also be present in the surf zone.
info.instruction: High surf will affect the beaches in the advisory area, producing localized beach erosion and dangerous swimming conditions. Swimmers should remain out of the water due to large breaking waves and dangerous surf conditions.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Indian River; Coastal Martin; Coastal St. Lucie; Mainland Southern Brevard; Southern Brevard Barrier Islands
